title: [www.zomato.com] IDOR - Gold Subscription Details, Able to view "Membership ID" and "Validity Details" of other Users

profile.name: Zomato
profile.about: The fastest way to search for great places to eat at and order from around you. Serving 24 countries worldwide.

vulnerability_information:
Hello Zomato,

The following URL : https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?subscription_id=██████████&user_id=█████████ is vulnerable to IDOR in `subscription_id` field. Anyone can get Subscription Start & End Date and Plan Duration of a Membership ID just by changing the `subscription_id` parameter. 
{F291153}

MEMBERSHIP ID : ████
STARTED ON : 22 Dec 2017
VALID UP TO : 22 Jun 2018
Subscription Plan :  6 month plan

## Impact

Anyone can get Subscription Start & End Date and Plan Duration of a Membership ID.

___Cheers!
Riya___

activities.message:
Hi @riya, 

Thank you for your submission! Could you share more details about reproduction steps? as requesting above URL redirecting me to `https://www.zomato.com/warszawa/gold/coming-soon`.

Regards.

Hey @riya Welcome to Bug Bounties :)

This is not an issue actually, I'll explain it in detail:

- https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?subscription_id=████&user_id=█████, would only work when the subscription_id > is_user_id, means you have to know both in order to know about the `Validity Details` of other Members. But that's too a pretty low or no risk at all.

- Second, @chessmast3r this redirected you to `gold/coming-soon` page because you don't have any Gold Subscriptions, so this only works when one is the subscribed member of Gold but one has to know both in order to get the `Validity Details` of that particular member.

I hope this info helps. Happy Hunting :)

Cheers.

Hello @prateek_0490-zomato,

I figured out that by going to https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?subscription_id=███████&user_id=█████████ and changing the parameter __subscription_id__ one can get anyone's details in link with the __subscription_id__ the __user_id__ doesn't matter in the above request, we can also do it by completely removing the user_id in the request i.e https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?subscription_id=███████ and get Subscription Start & End Date and Plan Duration against any Membership ID. I think the impact is pretty same as in #313050 We cant get the subscription details against a user_id as #313050 but we can get details against all Membership IDs. I would request you to re evaluate the report.

___Cheers!
Riya___

@riya 

Still this doesn't poses any risk. Since you're only able to see the `Validity Details` but not the `user` who holds that membership.

While in #313050, it was something a privacy concern where that endpoint leaked which user holds treat membership, but here there is no such concern as it only leaks the `Validity Details`.

But seeing you're new to Bug Bounty, we would like to encourage you and we would like to encourage more female bug bounty hunters to get into this field and make the Internet a safer place. Good Luck.

Cheers.

Hello @prateek_0490-zomato,

A little bit more fuzzing around i can now view that which user is a gold member and their Membership id, Subscription Start & End Date and Plan Duration. So in the above request if we only supply the __user_id__ parameter then if a user is a gold member we get a 301 redirect to a link with that specific user's subscription_id, i.e Visiting the following url https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?user_id=███████ will redirect you to https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?subscription_id=212504 So the membership_id/subscription_id of the user account ███████ is 212504, now using intruder we can find who all are gold members by changing the user_id in the request https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?user_id=█████ if the user is a gold member we will get a 301 redirect with the user's subscription_id and we can find out their subscription details.
Here are the results of Intruder :
Request : 
{F291171}

{F291172}

And by combining both the requests we can get all the users who are zomato gold members and their gold plan's subscription start, end date and plan duration, i.e the subscription id for the user whose user id is ████████ is 179268 so by going to https://www.zomato.com/gold/payment-success?subscription_id=179268&user_id=█████ 
{F291173}
We can get the user's photo, name, subscription id, subscription start, end date and plan duration and using intruder we can find out all the gold users of zomato and their details which now think is a privacy issue and thanks a lot for the encouragement, i really appreciate it :) 

___Cheers!
Riya___
